coza.opencollab.synthesis.service.synch

Class SynchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • coza.opencollab.synthesis.service.BaseController
      • coza.opencollab.synthesis.service.synch.SynchController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Defaults

    @Controller
@RequestMapping(value="/service-synch")
public class SynchController
extends BaseController
    The controller for content. This handle content checks and synchronization with sakai. This class handle RestFull service calls using JSON.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.1
    Author:
    OpenCollab

    • Method Detail

      • getContent

        @RequestMapping(value="/contentUpdate/{username}/{moduleId}/{toolName:.+}/{contentVersion:.+}",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public SynchContent getContent(@RequestBody
                                                  String body,
                                                  @PathVariable
                                                  String username,
                                                  @PathVariable
                                                  String moduleId,
                                                  @PathVariable
                                                  String toolName,
                                                  @PathVariable
                                                  String contentVersion)
        This method handles calls to retrieve tool content.
        Parameters:
        body - The body contain the password. {\"password\":\"123\"}
        username - The username
        moduleId - The module id
        toolName - The tool name
        contentVersion - The current tool content version
        Returns:
        The new tool content

      • getSynchStatusB

        @RequestMapping(value="/synchStatus/{username}/{moduleId}",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public SynchStatus getSynchStatusB(@RequestBody
                                                      String body,
                                                      @PathVariable
                                                      String username,
                                                      @PathVariable
                                                      String moduleId)
        This method handles calls to check the synch status of the client, tools and content.
        Parameters:
        body - The body should contain json for the SynchStatus class. Json: {\"deviceVersion\":\"20131010124513\",\"toolVersions\":{\"assign\":\"99151\",\"announce\":\"134548\",\"faq\":\"514984984\"}}
        username - The username
        moduleId - The module id
        Returns:
        The updated SynchStatus containing the out of synch data

      • getSynchStatus

        @RequestMapping(value="/synchStatus/{username}",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public SynchStatus getSynchStatus(@RequestBody
                                                     String body,
                                                     @PathVariable
                                                     String username)
        This method handles calls to check the synch status of the client, tools and content.
        Parameters:
        body - The body should contain json for the SynchStatus class. Json: {\"deviceVersion\":\"20131010124513\",\"toolVersions\":{\"assign\":\"99151\",\"announce\":\"134548\",\"faq\":\"514984984\"}}
        username - The username
        Returns:
        The updated SynchStatus containing the out of synch data

      • updateContentVersion

        @RequestMapping(value="/contentVersion/{username}/{moduleId}/{toolName:.+}/{toolVersion:.+}",
                method=PUT)
@ResponseBody
public UpdateStatus updateContentVersion(@PathVariable
                                                            String username,
                                                            @PathVariable
                                                            String moduleId,
                                                            @PathVariable
                                                            String toolName,
                                                            @PathVariable
                                                            String toolVersion)
        Update the client's tool content version on the server
        Parameters:
        username - The username
        moduleId - The module id.
        toolName - The tool name
        toolVersion - The current tool version
        Returns:
        a UpdateStatus object.

      • updateContent

        @RequestMapping(value="/content/{username}/{moduleId}/{toolName:.+}",
                method=PUT)
@ResponseBody
public UpdateContent updateContent(@RequestBody
                                                      String body,
                                                      @PathVariable
                                                      String username,
                                                      @PathVariable
                                                      String moduleId,
                                                      @PathVariable
                                                      String toolName)
        Update/upload the content for the client tool from the client to the server.
        Parameters:
        username - The username
        moduleId - The module id
        toolName - The tool name
        body - a String object.
        Returns:
        The updated files for the current tool versions
